FetchUsers
SELECT
  USER_ID,
  USER_NAME
FROM
  USERS
WHERE
  USER_TYPE = :type
  AND
  STATUS = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT
  *
FROM
  EMPLOYEES E
WHERE
  E.DEPT_ID = :deptId

Orders
SELECT
  ORDER_ID
FROM
  ORDERS
:_WHERE_AND
(
  ORDER_DATE >= :fromDate,
  ORDER_DATE <= :toDate
)

-- コメント行はそのまま出力される

SubQueryExample
SELECT
  C.CUSTOMER_ID,
  (
    SELECT
      COUNT(*)
    FROM
      ORDERS O
    WHERE
      O.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID
      AND
      O.STATUS IN('NEW', 'HOLD')
  ) AS ORDER_COUNT
FROM
  CUSTOMERS C
WHERE
  EXISTS
  (
    SELECT
      1
    FROM
      PAYMENTS P
    WHERE
      P.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID
      AND
      P.AMOUNT > 1000
  )

UpdateSimple
UPDATE
  EMPLOYEES
SET
  STATUS = 'ACTIVE',
  UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE
WHERE
  EMP_ID = :empId

UpdateWithSubquery
UPDATE
  EMPLOYEES
SET
  STATUS = 'INACTIVE'
WHERE
  EMP_ID IN
  (
    SELECT
      EMP_ID
    FROM
      TERMINATION_REQUESTS
    WHERE
      REQUEST_DATE > SYSDATE - 30
  )

InsertSimple
INSERT INTO SALES
  (SALE_ID, AMOUNT, CREATED_AT)
VALUES
  (:saleId, :amount, SYSDATE)

InsertWithSubquery
INSERT INTO SALES_SUMMARY
  (CUSTOMER_ID, TOTAL_AMOUNT)
SELECT
  CUSTOMER_ID,
  SUM(AMOUNT)
FROM
  SALES_DETAIL
WHERE
  SALE_DATE BETWEEN :from
  AND
  :to
GROUP BY
  CUSTOMER_ID

DeleteSimple
DELETE
FROM
  SESSIONS
WHERE
  EXPIRES_AT < SYSDATE

DeleteWithSubquery
DELETE
FROM
  SESSIONS
WHERE
  USER_ID IN
  (
    SELECT
      USER_ID
    FROM
      USERS
    WHERE
      STATUS = 'LOCKED'
  )
